verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Change my heart Oh God
Make it ever true
Change my heart Oh God
may I be like You (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the Potter
I am the clay
mold me and make me
this is what I pray

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Change my heart Oh God
Make it ever true
Change my heart Oh God
may I be like You
